SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(BAND_NO,5)))+1 FROM BAND
INSERT INTO BAND( BAND_NO, BAND_LEADERID, BAND_NAME, BAND_INTRO, BAND_KEYWORD, BAND_OPEN_OPTION, BAND_AGE_OPTION, BAND_AGE_BEFOROPTION, BAND_AGE_AFTEROPTION, BAND_CATEGORY, BAND_GENDER_OPTION, BAND_MEMBERSHIP_OPTION, BAND_LOCATION, BAND_GENDER ) VALUES( 'BDU_'||#{bandNo}, #{bandLeaderid}, #{bandName}, #{bandIntro}, #{bandKeyword}, #{bandOpenOption}, #{bandAgeOption}, #{bandAgeBeforoption}, #{bandAgeAfteroption}, #{bandCategory}, #{bandGenderOption}, #{bandMembershipOption}, #{bandLocation}, #{bandGender} )

mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT A.BAND_NO "bandNo", A.BAND_NAME "bandName", A.BAND_INTRO "bandIntro", A.BAND_KEYWORD "bandKeyword", A.BAND_OPEN_OPTION "bandOpenOption", A.BAND_AGE_OPTION "bandAgeOption", A.BAND_AGE_BEFOROPTION "bandAgeBeforoption", A.BAND_AGE_AFTEROPTION "bandAgeafteroption", C.EXERSUB_NAME "bandCategory", A.BAND_GENDER_OPTION "bandGenderOption", A.BAND_MEMBERSHIP_OPTION "bandMembershipOption", D.LOC_CITY "bandLocation", E.MEMCOUNT "memcount", A.BAND_LEADERID "bandLeaderid"
FROM BAND A, BAND_MEMBER_DETAIL B, EXER_SUB C, OWN_LOCATION D, (SELECT BAND_NO, COUNT(*) "MEMCOUNT" FROM BAND_MEMBER_DETAIL WHERE BAND_NO = #{bandNo} and band_member_status = 'BA02' GROUP BY BAND_NO) E
WHERE A.BAND_NO = B.BAND_NO AND A.BAND_NO = #{bandNo} AND B.BAND_MEMBER_STATUS = 'BA02' AND B.BAND_KICK_STATUS = 'BB01' AND A.BAND_NO = E.BAND_NO AND A.BAND_CATEGORY = C.EXERSUB_NO AND A.BAND_LOCATION = D.LOC_CODE
select count(*) FROM BAND A, EXER_SUB B, OWN_LOCATION C WHERE A.BAND_CATEGORY = B.EXERSUB_NO AND A.BAND_LOCATION = C.LOC_CODE AND BAND_OPEN_OPTION IN ('BC01', 'BC03')

SELECT A.BAND_NO, A.BAND_LEADERID, A.BAND_NAME, A.BAND_INTRO, A.BAND_KEYWORD, A.BAND_OPEN_OPTION, A.BAND_AGE_OPTION, A.BAND_AGE_BEFOROPTION, A.BAND_AGE_AFTEROPTION, A.BAND_CATEGORY, A.BAND_GENDER_OPTION, A.BAND_MEMBERSHIP_OPTION, A.BAND_LOCATION A.BAND_GENDER FROM BAND A, BAND_MEMBER_DETAIL B WHERE A.BAND_NO = B.BAND_NO AND B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND B.BAND_MEMBER_STATUS = 'BA02' AND B.BAND_KICK_STATUS = 'BB01'

with xxx as ( SELECT BAND_NO, MAX(RECENTDAY) "RECENTDAY" FROM ( SELECT A.BAND_NO, B.RECENTDAY FROM BAND_BOARD_OPTION A, (SELECT MAX(BAND_BOARD_DATE) "RECENTDAY", BAND_BOARD_OPTION_NO FROM BAND_BOARD_DETAIL GROUP BY BAND_BOARD_OPTION_NO) B WHERE A.BAND_BOARD_OPTION_NO=B.BAND_BOARD_OPTION_NO ) GROUP BY BAND_NO ), bbb as (SELECT BAND_NO, COUNT(*) "MEMCOUNT" FROM BAND_MEMBER_DETAIL where band_member_status = 'BA02' GROUP BY BAND_NO )
SELECT distinct A.BAND_NO "bandNo", A.BAND_NAME "bandName", A.BAND_INTRO "bandIntro", A.BAND_KEYWORD "bandKeyword", A.BAND_OPEN_OPTION "bandOpenOption", A.BAND_AGE_OPTION "bandAgeOption", A.BAND_AGE_BEFOROPTION "bandAgeBeforoption", A.BAND_AGE_AFTEROPTION "bandAgeAfteroption", A.BAND_CATEGORY "bandCategory", A.BAND_GENDER_OPTION "bandGenderOption", A.BAND_MEMBERSHIP_OPTION "bandMembershipOption", A.BAND_LOCATION "bandLocation", C.RECENTDAY "recentday", D.MEMCOUNT "memcount" FROM BAND A, BAND_MEMBER_DETAIL B, xxx C , bbb D
WHERE A.BAND_NO = B.BAND_NO AND B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND B.BAND_MEMBER_STATUS = 'BA02' AND B.BAND_KICK_STATUS = 'BB01' AND A.BAND_NO = C.BAND_NO(+) AND A.BAND_NO = D.BAND_NO(+) ORDER BY C.RECENTDAY DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT BAND_NO, BAND_LEADERID, BAND_NAME, BAND_INTRO, EXERSUB_NAME "band_category", BAND_OPEN_OPTION, BAND_AGE_OPTION, BAND_AGE_BEFOROPTION, BAND_AGE_AFTEROPTION, BAND_KEYWORD, BAND_GENDER_OPTION, BAND_MEMBERSHIP_OPTION, LOC_CITY "band_location", BAND_GENDER FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM
( SELECT BAND_NO, BAND_LEADERID, BAND_NAME, BAND_INTRO, EXERSUB_NAME, BAND_OPEN_OPTION, BAND_AGE_OPTION, BAND_AGE_BEFOROPTION, BAND_AGE_AFTEROPTION, BAND_CATEGORY, BAND_KEYWORD, BAND_GENDER_OPTION, BAND_MEMBERSHIP_OPTION, LOC_CITY, BAND_GENDER FROM( SELECT * FROM BAND WHERE BAND_NO NOT IN
(SELECT BAND_NO FROM BAND_MEMBER_DETAIL WHERE USER_ID=#{bandLeaderid})
AND BAND_OPEN_OPTION IN ('BC01', 'BC03')
AND BAND_GENDER_OPTION = 'BE02'
AND BAND_AGE_OPTION = 'BD02' UNION
SELECT * FROM BAND WHERE BAND_NO NOT IN
(SELECT BAND_NO FROM BAND_MEMBER_DETAIL WHERE USER_ID=#{bandLeaderid})
AND BAND_OPEN_OPTION IN ('BC01', 'BC03')
AND BAND_AGE_OPTION = 'BD02'
AND BAND_GENDER_OPTION = 'BE01' AND BAND_GENDER = #{bandGender} UNION
SELECT * FROM BAND WHERE BAND_NO NOT IN
(SELECT BAND_NO FROM BAND_MEMBER_DETAIL WHERE USER_ID=#{bandLeaderid})
AND BAND_OPEN_OPTION IN ('BC01', 'BC03')
AND BAND_AGE_OPTION = 'BD01'
AND BAND_GENDER_OPTION = 'BE02' AND #{bandAgeAfteroption} BETWEEN BAND_AGE_BEFOROPTION AND BAND_AGE_AFTEROPTION ) A, EXER_SUB B, OWN_LOCATION C WHERE A.BAND_CATEGORY = B.EXERSUB_NO AND A.BAND_LOCATION=C.LOC_CODE
)
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{last} ) WHERE RN >= #{first}

SELECT count(*) FROM
( SELECT BAND_NO, BAND_LEADERID, BAND_NAME, BAND_INTRO, EXERSUB_NAME, BAND_OPEN_OPTION, BAND_AGE_OPTION, BAND_AGE_BEFOROPTION, BAND_AGE_AFTEROPTION, BAND_CATEGORY, BAND_KEYWORD, BAND_GENDER_OPTION, BAND_MEMBERSHIP_OPTION, LOC_CITY, BAND_GENDER FROM( SELECT * FROM BAND WHERE BAND_NO NOT IN
(SELECT BAND_NO FROM BAND_MEMBER_DETAIL WHERE BAND_MEMBER_STATUS in 'BA02' AND USER_ID=#{bandLeaderid})
AND BAND_OPEN_OPTION IN ('BC01', 'BC03')
AND BAND_GENDER_OPTION = 'BE02'
AND BAND_AGE_OPTION = 'BD02' UNION
SELECT * FROM BAND WHERE BAND_NO NOT IN
(SELECT BAND_NO FROM BAND_MEMBER_DETAIL WHERE BAND_MEMBER_STATUS = 'BA02' AND USER_ID=#{bandLeaderid})
AND BAND_OPEN_OPTION IN ('BC01', 'BC03')
AND BAND_AGE_OPTION = 'BD02'
AND BAND_GENDER_OPTION = 'BE01' AND BAND_GENDER = NULL UNION
SELECT * FROM BAND WHERE BAND_NO NOT IN
(SELECT BAND_NO FROM BAND_MEMBER_DETAIL WHERE BAND_MEMBER_STATUS = 'BA02' AND USER_ID=#{bandLeaderid})
AND BAND_OPEN_OPTION IN ('BC01', 'BC03')
AND BAND_AGE_OPTION = 'BD01'
AND BAND_GENDER_OPTION = 'BE02' AND NULL BETWEEN BAND_AGE_BEFOROPTION AND BAND_AGE_AFTEROPTION ) A, EXER_SUB B, OWN_LOCATION C WHERE A.BAND_CATEGORY = B.EXERSUB_NO AND A.BAND_LOCATION=C.LOC_CODE
)
